title: When We Will Have Computer's Displays like 'Mirasol Displays' Available? - Quora

response.answer_text: The “Mirasol” or “iMOD” technology is no longer being active developed by Qualcomm, the company which currently owns this technology, so it’s unlikely we’ll see any displays of this type in the near future. This is a full-color reflective display technology, but it’s not particularly fast and so is not suitable for full-speed video screen. That makes it much less attractive for applications such as TVs, laptops, smartphones, or computer monitors.
